definitions.definition: To cause to suffer ; to trouble , afflict . (Now chiefly in interrogative or indefinite constructions.)
examples: Have some chicken soup. It's good for what ails you.

definitions.definition: To be ill ; to suffer ; to be troubled .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To cause to suffer ; to trouble , afflict . (Now chiefly in interrogative or indefinite constructions.)
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To be ill ; to suffer ; to be troubled .
